```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

Loading NYC Restaurant Inspection Data

```{r}


rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec

```

```{r}
rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  select(boro, critical_flag, cuisine_description, dba, inspection_date, score, zipcode, grade, building) %>% 
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C", "Z", "P"),
         cuisine_description %in% c("Italian", "Pizza"))
```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  count(boro) %>% 
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~n, color = ~boro, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Grade: ", grade, "\nName: ", dba)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~inspection_date, y = ~score, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    color = ~grade, text = ~text_label, alpha = 0.5)
```

  separate(inspection_date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), convert = TRUE)
